CustomField.formula:
IF(FLOOR(( Arrival_Date_Time__c - Departure_Date_Time__c )*24)>9, TEXT(FLOOR(( Arrival_Date_Time__c - Departure_Date_Time__c )*24)), "0" & TEXT(FLOOR(( Arrival_Date_Time__c - Departure_Date_Time__c )*24))) &
" " &"Hours"& " "& IF(ROUND(MOD(( Arrival_Date_Time__c - Departure_Date_Time__c )*1440,60),0)>9, TEXT(ROUND(MOD(( Arrival_Date_Time__c - Departure_Date_Time__c )*1440,60),0)), "0" & TEXT(ROUND(MOD(( Arrival_Date_Time__c - Departure_Date_Time__c )*1440,60),0)))& " " &"Minutes"
CustomField.label: Duration
